channel.title: Reversing on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Reversing on TLDRBins

item.title: Android
item.description: Unpack .apk File # Get .smali files java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar d <FILE> # Get .java files jadx <FILE> Ref: apktool Ref: jadx Re-pack .apk File 1. Initial Pack java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar b --use-aapt2 <APP> -o <APP>_repacked.apk 2. Zip Align zipalign 3. Sign the Apk keytool -genkey -v -keystore my-release-key.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 -alias my-alias apksigner sign --ks my-release-key.jks --ks-pass pass:'<PASSWORD>' --out <APP>_final.apk <APP>_repacked.apk Dynamic Debugging 1. Set up +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | 1.

item.title: Java
item.description: Decompile JAR jd-gui Ref: Download jd-gui Compile # Compile javac src/program.java # Pack into jar jar -cvf program.jar -C src/ .

item.title: Memory Dump
item.description: Tools binwalk pypykatz MemProcFS # Extract files from memory dump binwalk -M -e <MEMORY_DUMP> Ref: binwalk # Mini dump pypykatz lsa minidump <MEMORY_DUMP> ./memprocfs -mount <PATH> -device <MEMORY_DUMP> Ref: MemProcFS

item.title: Python Decompile
item.description: Tools pyinstxtractor uncompyle6 pycdc # Unpack pyinstaller packed binary pyinstxtractor <FILE> # Install pip3 install uncompyle6 # Run (need .pyc extension) uncompyle6 <PYC_FILE> # Install git clone https://github.com/zrax/pycdc.git cd pycdc cmake . make make check # Run ./pycdc <PYC_FILE> Ref: pycdc
